meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unconscionable.
meanings.sent1: The unconscionablenesses of his actions left everyone shocked.
meanings.sent2: Her unconscionablenesses were evident in her unfair treatment of others.
meanings.sent3: The unconscionablenesses of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The unconscionablenesses of the decision weighed heavily on his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The unconscionablenesses of the crime were impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of behaving in an unconscionable manner.
meanings.sent1: His unconscionablenesses towards his employees led to a lot of complaints.
meanings.sent2: The unconscionablenesses of her behavior were unacceptable in a professional setting.
meanings.sent3: The unconscionablenesses of his excuses made everyone roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her unconscionablenesses in negotiations were compared to those of a ruthless dictator.
meanings.sent5: The unconscionablenesses of his actions were a clear violation of company policy.
